Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6210 ARDREY KELL ROAD,SUITE 600, CHARLOTTE, North Carolina, 28277, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NN Inc is a diversified industrial company that combines advanced engineering and production capabilities with in-depth materials science expertise to design and manufacture high-precision solutions and components. It operates in two business segments: mobile solutions and power solutions. The mobile solutions segment involves growth in the general industrial and automotive end markets. Its power solutions segment involves growth in the electrical and aerospace and defense end markets. It also operates in China, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, and other countries.

value.name: Tim French
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
